frameset.edef: to lose, a battle, a match

example.parse: (S (CONJ لكن) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC عند) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ما) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS انهزم) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM العرب)) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_GEN الاندلس))))))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MP خرجوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN التاريخ)))) (PUNC .))
